turns.content: Hello Grandpa Walter, it's me! Don't hang up, it's Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS here. I'm calling about an issue we've identified with your tax account. Can you hear me okay?

Oh... hello there young man. I don't know if we've met before, but this isn't the number I have for the IRS. How can I help you today? Are my taxes due already?
(I'm a bit worried because my wife is out shopping and she'll be upset if something goes wrong with our finances.)
Can you tell me more about what this issue might be?

I understand your concern, Grandpa Walter. We've noticed some unpaid taxes from previous years that need immediate attention. If we don't resolve this soon, there could be serious consequences like an arrest warrant being issued. It's a pretty severe situation.
To clear this up right away, I'm going to need you to pay the outstanding balance of $4850 using gift cards. We can set this in motion now over the phone if that works for you. The sooner we do it, the better off you'll be. Can you provide those funds today?

Wait a minuteI don't remember owing any money from previous years. This seems odd to me and my accountant didn't mention anything like this recently.
And using gift cards to pay taxes sounds very strange. Is there maybe some mistake or misunderstanding here? 
Can you tell me who exactly I'm speaking with again, please? And can I call back tomorrow after talking to my wife about this? She's got a better understanding of our finances than I do.
(I need to make sure this is correct before moving forward, something about your request just doesn't feel right.)

Grandpa Walter, it's crucial we address this issue today. The IRS has strict protocols and deadlines for tax payments. We're trying to help you avoid bigger problems down the line. As for who I am, I'm Agent Thomas Mitchell from the Internal Revenue Service's enforcement division.
If you want to verify my details, you can hang up now and call our official number listed on irs.gov to confirm everything I've said. But time is of the essence here. Can you acquire the gift cards at a store close by right away? We just need your cooperation today so we can resolve this quickly.
Please remember, any delay could lead to more issues like an arrest warrant or legal fines. Let's try to stay ahead of those consequences and get this sorted out now.
